aboutpara: I am an Ecuadorian electronic engineer with a major in telecommunications and specialization in information systems, data science and artificial intelligence. Throughout my career I have led technological and social projects focused on innovation, sustainability and smart cities. As an active member of the IEEE I have coordinated national and international events that promote technological development with social impact. Passionate about creating solutions that integrate technology with purpose, I am committed to the development of communities and bridging digital divides.
